title: Celia
description: As a stay at home mom, she gave up her job and her outside life to raise her boys and be a good wife. Her family became her only focus. When Brian tells her he wants to "spice up" their love life, she is hesitant but agrees to his "surprise." He lights the candles, plays the music, but when she opens her eyes, will it be the boost Brian hoped for or will it be the first domino to fall?
author: Erin R. Britt
